algorithm_technique: Convert the integer to a string and insert separators from right to left based on digit count.
problem_summary_simple: Format an integer by adding dots as thousands separators.
problem_summary_technical: Convert the integer to a string and iterate from right to left, inserting a '.' every three digits.
key_insights: The problem requires formatting, not mathematical calculation.
Iterating from the right end of the string simplifies the logic for placing separators.
The modulo operator on the length of the string from the right helps determine separator placement.
